```go
func main() { 
   var gal gallon = 5 
   gal.half() 
   fmt.Println(gal) 
} 

*gallon type, which is updated using *g = gallon(*g * 2). So when the following is invoked in main, it would print a value of 10:
```

```go
func main() { 
   var gal gallon = 5 
   gal.double() 
   fmt.Println(gal) 
} 

```
